description.en:
Science or magic?

 « Welcome to Paris, elected for the 68th month in a row as the least polluted city in the world. Thanks to cyanel, the air we breathe inside our houses is purified. » 

In a futuristic Paris, pollution is so prevalent that all greenery has disappeared. Recently, a gigantic plant appeared in the heart of the city, and the authorities are making sure no one gets close… Thomas, a young science student, is secretly studying the phenomenon, hoping for a better life.

Raised by his witchcraft-loving grand-mother, he is often prone to hallucinations. One day, he crosses paths with a strange young girl with very bright eyes, who faints in the air. From then on, his fate changes…
description.fr:
Science ou magie ?

« Bienvenue à Paris, élue pour le 68e mois consécutif : Ville la moins polluée du monde. C’est grâce au cyanel que nous pouvons respirer un air purifié à l’intérieur de nos maisons. »

Dans un Paris futuriste, la pollution est tellement présente que toute végétation a disparu. Depuis peu, une plante gigantesque a fait son apparition au cœur de la ville, et les autorités veillent à ce que la population ne s’en approche pas… Thomas, un jeune étudiant scientiste, se livre secrètement à l’étude de ce phénomène, peut-être un espoir pour une vie meilleure.

Élevé par sa grand-mère passionnée de sorcellerie, il est souvent victime d’hallucinations. Un jour, il croise une étrange jeune fille aux yeux très clairs qui s’évanouit dans les airs. Dès lors, son destin va basculer….

title.en: Kuroiwa Medaka ni Watashi no Kawaii ga Tsuujinai

altTitles.ja: 黒岩メダカに私の可愛いが通じない

altTitles.en: Medaka Kuroiwa is Impervious to My Charms
Kuroiwa Medaka is Proof Against My Cuteness

altTitles.zh: 我的可爱对黑岩目高不管用

altTitles.ru: Куроива Мэдака не понимает моей привлекательности

altTitles.es-la: Mis encantos no funcionan con Kuroiwa Medaka

description.en:
Kuroiwa Medaka was born in a temple and is currently a monk in training. Because of his temple's rules, he can't interact with girls - and what's more, he doesn't even know how to regularly socialize with them. Mona, the "queen bee" of the school, however insistently tries to make him fall in love with her, but he always ignores her in order to maintain the rules of his temple.
___
**Links:**
- Alternative Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10032/episode/312982) (U.S. Only)
description.fr:
Tu ne le sais pas encore, mais tu m’adores !

Mona plaît à tout le monde, c’est comme ça. Son sourire, son allure, sa personnalité… Tout chez elle attire les gens. Dans son lycée, elle fait tourner toutes les têtes. Sauf celle d’un garçon… Medaka. Fraîchement admis dans son école, celui-ci a complètement chamboulé la vie de cette fille à qui nul ni personne n’est censé résister. C’est bien simple : Medaka refuse de la regarder ou se renfrogne à la moindre de ses tentatives de rapprochement. Devant cette insulte à son charme ravageur, Mona décide de tout mettre en œuvre pour le séduire, quitte à se mettre dans des situations où elle-même ne saura plus quoi ressentir ! La tombeuse VS l’insensible : qui craquera en premier ? 

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Pika**
description.ja:
オチないアイツに、最強モテ女が大奮闘！「アイツのことなんて、ぜんっぜん好きじゃないないのに！！」

容姿端麗！ スタイル抜群！ 川井モナは、息をするようにモテる女!! しかし、そんな彼女に見向きもしない転校生・黒岩メダカの登場で、モナの学校生活は一変する！「今までずっと、チヤホヤされて生きてきたのに!!」あの手この手でメダカをオトそうと大奮闘！時にはちょっぴりカゲキなことも!?
description.ru: Куроива Мэдака родился в храме и в настоящее время является монахом, проходящим обучение. Из-за правил своего храма он не может общаться с девушками и более того, он даже не знает, как с ними общаться. Мона, "королева пчёл" школы, однако настойчиво пытается заставить его влюбиться в неё, но он всегда игнорирует её, чтобы сохранить правила своего храма.
description.es-la:
La mujer más popular del mundo lucha contra un tipo que no le gusta. ¡Ni siquiera me gusta en absoluto!

¡Buena apariencia! Estilo excepcional! ¡Kawai Mona es una mujer impresionante! Sin embargo, con la aparición de un estudiante transferido, Kuroiwa Medaka, que ni siquiera la mira, ¡la vida escolar de Mona cambiará por completo! "  Ella se ha pasado toda su vida siendo consentida y ha hecho todo lo posible por ganarse a Medaka que aveces pueder un poco radical.

¡La comedia romantica de una chica popular y un chico abstinente está a punto de estallar!
description.pt-br: Kuroiwa nasceu em um templo e atualmente é um monge em treinamento. Por causa das regras do seu templo, ele não pode interagir com garotas - e mais, nem mesmo sabe como fazer isso. Mona, a "abelha rainha" da escola, insistentemente tenta fazê-lo se apaixonar por ela, mas ele sempre a ignora a fim de se manter íntegro quanto as regras do seu templo.

title.en: The Dentist Won't Stop Teasing Me

description.en: After suffering from an unbearable pain caused by a wisdom tooth, Cai Tong'an visits the dentist, only to be greeted with a beautiful and gentle Dr. Xie Ruanqing. To her surprise, she turns out to be the senior she secretly admired during her university days...

A slum where criminals' descendants live... People beyond the border look down and discriminate them as "tribal people." Ludo, an orphan boy, lives in the slum with his foster parent, Legt, and makes a living using his extraordinary physical abilities. However, one day, he was accused for a crime he didn't commit., and is thrown into the "abyss" which even the slum people fear.
___
Living in the slums of a wealthy town, Rudo and his foster father Legto try to coexist with the rest of the town's residents, but Rudo despises the wastefulness of the upper class. Ignoring the warnings from those around him, Rudo regularly rummages through the town's garbage in search of anything useful or valuable to save from the "Abyss"—a massive hole where anything considered trash is dumped, including people. Rudo's biological father was one such person, having been thrown into the Abyss after he was accused of murder.

One day, after running into a mysterious figure on the way home, Rudo returns to find Legto's dying body on the floor. He is immediately found at the scene by the authorities and is charged with murder. No one believes his claims of innocence, and he is thrown into the Abyss. Instead of dying, however, he finds himself in a strange, foul-smelling place surrounded by monsters made out of trash.

When Rudo is attacked by said monsters, he is saved by a man named Engine, who reveals himself to be a "janitor"—someone who uses special weapons called "jinkis" to combat these creatures. In order to get his revenge on the one who killed Legto, Rudo reluctantly becomes a janitor to fight his way back up and out of the Abyss.
___
**Additional Links:**
- Alternative Official English: [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10010/episode/325146) (US Only)
description.fa:
در اطـــــــراف حلبی‌آباد  پرتـگاهی وجـو د دارد که هرکـس مرتکب
خلافی شود به آنجا پـــــرت می‌شــود. رودو یتــیمی است که   در 
آنجا زندگی میکند اما روزی  به‌خاطر یک پاپوش او را به اشــــــــد
مجازات محکوم می‌کنند.
description.id:
Di daerah kumuh dimana keturunan kriminal tinggal... orang-orang yang di luar perbatasan mendiskriminasi dan merendahkan mereka sebagai "orang suku.". rudo, anak yatim, yang tinggal di daerah kumuh dengan orang tua angkatnya, regto, dan bertahan hidup menggunakan kemampuan fisik hebatnya. bagaimanapun, suatu hari, dia dituduh melakukan kejahatan yang dia tidak lakukan, dan dilempar ke dalam "abyss" yang bahkan orang-orang di daerah kumu bahkan ditakuti.'
Tinggal di daerah kumuh dari kota makmur, Rudo dan ayah angkatnya regto mencoba untuk bersahabat dengan orang-orang kota, tapi rudo membenci borosnya orang kelas atas. mengabaikan peringatan dari sekitarnya, Rudo mengais sampah melalui tempat pembuangan kota untuk mencari barang-barang bernilai atau berguna untuk diselamatkan dari "abyss"- lubang besar dimana apapun yang dianggap sampah dibuang ke sana, termasuk manusia. Ayah kandung Rudo termasuk orang itu, yang dilempar ke dalalm Abys setelah dia difitnah melakukan pembunuhan.
Suatu hari, setelah lari dari sesosok misterius saat jalan pulang, Rudo menemukan tubuh sekarat Regto terbaring di lantai. dia dengan segera ditemukan di tkp oleh petugas dan dijatuhi dengan pembunuhan. Tidak seorangpun percaya ketidak bersalahannya, dan dia dilempar ke Abyss. Alih-alih mati, dia menemukan dirinya di tempat aneh, dan berbau busuk yang dikelilingi oleh monster yang terbuat dari sampah.
Ketika rudo diserang oleh monster itu, dia diselamatkan oleh pria yang bernama enjin, yang menyebut dirinya sebagai "janitor"- seseorang yang menggunakan senjata spesial yang disebut "jinki" untuk melawan makhluk itu. Agar dapat balas dendam pada orang yang membunuh Regto, Rudo dengan enggan menjadi seorang janitor untuk dapat kembali ke atas dan keluar dari Abyss.
description.ja: 犯罪者の子孫たちが暮らすスラム街。境界線の向こうの人々からは「族民」とさげすまれ、差別を受けていた。孤児だった少年・ルドは、育ての親であるレグトと共にスラム街に住み、常人離れした身体能力を武器に生計を立てていた。だがある日、身に覚えのない罪を着せられ、スラムの人々でさえ恐れる「奈落」へと落とされてしまう……。
description.es-la:
Barrios marginales habitados por descendientes de delincuentes. La gente de fuera de la frontera los desprecia y discrimina como "gente de la tribu". Ludo, un niño huérfano, vive en el barrio bajo con su padre adoptivo Legto, y se gana la vida utilizando sus extraordinarias habilidades físicas. Sin embargo, un día es acusado de un crimen que no cometió y se ve abocado al "abismo" que hasta los habitantes de los barrios bajos temen.

(Source: Pocket Magazine)
description.pt-br: O grito redundante da alma que vem do fundo do poço em direção ao mundo infestado pelo desprezo e segregação! O subúrbio onde vivem os descendentes dos criminosos. Mesmo assim o Ludo vivia em meio à esse ambiente, de cabeça erguida, mas......!?

description.en: In a world where peoples' names grant them superhuman powers... Two agents from the Nordic Naming Bureau (NNB), an agency specialized in investigating crimes committed by "Namers", handle the case of a man and his missing wife and son. Things take a turn, however, when the duo come face to face with the man, who wishes to give his son the same name as himself...

description.en:
After killing the male lead, the originally innocent girl transformed into a villainess.
Just as she was about to enjoy her newfound freedom, she died a violent death and returned back to the start of the game.
Having carried over with her all the skills she acquired in her previous "playthrough", she was prepared to kill the male lead again; however, the current circumstances seem a bit... strange?
description.ru:
Убив главного героя, девушка становится монстром в глазах других, но, собираясь насладиться свободой, трагично погибает и оказывается в начале игры. Сохранив знания и навыки из прошлой жизни, она собирается повторить своё убийство, однако происходящее кажется немного… странным.
«Да кто же ты такой?!»
description.zh: 杀死男主角后，原小白花女二黑化成了女魔头，正当她快意江湖的时候却暴毙回到游戏的开头。继承了上周目所有能力的她准备先下手为强再次杀死男主，只是现在的情况好像有点……意外？ “不对，你到底谁啊——？！”

altTitles.ja: トライガンマキシマム

description.en:
Vash the Stampede rises again! It's been two years since the mysterious and super-nice gunman went into hiding, and the people of his desert planet are suffering. It takes a friend in peril to bring him out, and when he does, his enemies come chasing… as well as those crazy insurance girls, Millie and Meryl. And Wolfwood the wandering priest? Well, that's who found him in the first place! The gang's all back, and the trouble is coming in Trigun Maximum.

Notes:
 - Nightow changed publishers to Shonen Gahosha and the series continued to be serialized in Young King Ours magazine. Due to the original publisher retaining the name Trigun, Nightow had to change the title to Trigun Maximum, which isn´t a sequel but a new name for the rest of the series. 
- The first 3 volumes were published under the title 'Trigun' and the entire series compiled into 14 books as 'Trigun Maximum' (the numbering was also restarted when the title changed).
 - Won the Seiun Award at the 48th Japan Science Fiction Conventionwere for the best comic of the year.

altTitles.en: They are Still Being Shaken This Morning

description.en:
This is your typical story of a boy who's secretly in love with a girl, they both share a 20 minute ride on the commuter train on their way to different schools, will the boy be able to approach the girl and confess his love?
And also... What he doesn't know: There's 3 other passengers that secretly support the boy's secret love towards the girl!
Read now the hijinks that ensue when the boy tries to approach the girl; from the creator of *[Jitsu wa Watashi wa](https://mangadex.org/title/a990c2a1-b54f-4f4f-986c-3cdab1c9f2f9/)* and *[Yumemi ga Oka Wonderland](https://mangadex.org/title/32bbfefa-8a58-462c-bc9e-e9dd3bd4c152/)*.
description.ja: 午前6時58分舞原行きの通学電車。名前も知らないあの子と僕…とその乗客!? 高校生の男女2人が醸し出す甘酸っぱい雰囲気に、乗客たちが心情駄々洩れで盛り上がる!!
description.pt-br: Esta é a típica história de um garoto que está secretamente apaixonado por uma garota. Ambos compartilham uma viagem de 20 minutos no trem do subúrbio a caminho de escolas diferentes. O garoto será capaz de se aproximar da garota e confessar seu amor? E, além disso... O que ele não sabe: há três outros passageiros que secretamente apoiam o amor secreto do garoto pela garota! Leia agora as confusões que acontecem quando o garoto tenta se aproximar da garota; do criador de *[Jitsu wa Watashi wa](https://mangadex.org/title/a990c2a1-b54f-4f4f-986c-3cdab1c9f2f9/)* e *[Yumemi ga Oka Wonderland](https://mangadex.org/title/32bbfefa-8a58-462c-bc9e-e9dd3bd4c152/)*.

altTitles.th: ผู้กล้าแห่งอัสลัน

description.en:
As an unnaturally heavy mist descends on the battlefield, King Andragoras and his most valued officers confer among the bodies of dead and dying soldiers. When Daryoon, a young but highly skilled officer, voices his reluctance to send men into battle under these conditions, the king, unstable and enraged, banishes him.  
Now, Daryoon's new mission is to insure the safety of the King's only son, Prince Arislan. Daryoon and Prince Arislan set off on a quest of their own, but they can't succeed alone. They must convince both the Lord Narsus and his companion, the archer Elam, to join them in their quest to somehow help the soldiers win the war.  
  
Now a group of only six they must somehow overcome an enemy of 300,000 soldiers! These unlikely soldiers have fate on their side, so anything can happen!
description.ja: 国が燃えている…。世界はどれだけ広いのか？　強国「パルス」の王子・アルスラーンは、いまだ何者でもなく、ただ好奇心にあふれていた。「頼りない」「気弱」「器量不足」と言われたアルスラーンが14歳になった時、遠国の異教徒がパルスへ侵攻。アルスラーンは初陣の時を迎える。パルス軍の強さは古今無双。この戦もパルスの圧勝に終わると誰もが信じていた……。奈落へと落ちたアルスラーンの運命！
description.ru: Данное произведение является адаптацией новеллы «Сказание об Арслане». Манга повествует о молодом, неопытном, и все еще неуверенном в себе принце по имени Арслан. В возрасте 14 лет он вместе с отцом отправляется в свой первый поход, который и оказывается для него роковым. Это история о том, как молодой принц взрослеет и становится настоящим королем. История о том, как он будет доказывать всему миру, кто он такой.
description.pt-br: A história gira em torno do príncipe Arslan, que após escapar de uma guerra que devastou seu país, decide reunir um grupo de aliados que almejam o mesmo que ele: a busca por vingança. Para isso, eles vão precisar formar um exército para vencer os milhares de soldados que invadiram Pals, a terra natal de Arslan, controlados por Lord Silver Mask, que voltou para tomar posse do trono e governar Pals.

The 100 year quest which Natsu and company left for, and also to the members who had remained at the guild, something new is going to happen!? Although the story was supposed to have concluded, a new adventure now begins!

title.en: It Was Just a Contractual Marriage

altTitles.es-la: Fue sólo un matrimonio por contrato

description.en:
The empress of a fallen nation was dragged to the enemy empire. Despite everything, the Treasure of Grandel was still gorgeous. However, in the end she was just a captive who was going to be hanged by the savages. Eliza wanted to avoid that outcome no matter what, even if she had to tell outrageous lies. There was only one option: the man known as Banella's guard dog, the enemy empire's commander, and a lowly and vicious warrior—Lezet Christian. Eliza had to convince this cold and obstinate man who stood before her.

In a trembling voice, she said, "I'll give you a child."
description.pl:
Księżniczka z pokonanego kraju przywieziona do wrogiego, skarb Grandela, piękna nawet w chwili upadku.
Jednak nadal jest więźniarką, która wkrótce zostanie powieszona i przedstawiona barbarzyńcom.
Elise próbowała uciec przed tym losem i spróbować żyć.
Nawet jeśli wypowie absurdalne kłamstwo.
Jest tylko jedna możliwość.
Pies Banyella, głównodowodzący wrogiego państwa.
Do tego dziki smok, Rezette Kyrstan.
Elysee musiała przekonać tego zimnego, upartego człowieka na swoich oczach.
Drżącym głosem powiedziała.
"Urodzę twoje dziecko".

description.en:
Demon Queen Abyss is worried… She's not able to defeat the Hero, considered the mortal enemy of the demons. This Hero is still an inexperienced young man—he should be easy to defeat! … However, the problem is that he, not knowing Abyss's true identity, considers her his “Master” and has become very fond of her…!?
___
**Producer & Supervisor:** [studioHEADLINE](https://mangadex.org/author/657c3108-5817-4669-a957-a9c7ec5080ee/studio-headline)
description.pt-br: A Rainha Demônio Abyss está preocupada... ela não é capaz de derrotar o herói, considerado o inimigo mortal dos demônio. Esse herói ainda é um jovem inexperiente — ele deveria ser fácil de derrotar! ... Todavia, o problema é que ele, não conhecendo a verdadeira identidade de Abyss, a considera sua "Mestra" e gosta muito dela...!?

description.en:
The SCP Foundation is a fictional organization documented by the web-based collaborative fiction project of the same name. In universe, the SCP Foundation is responsible for locating and containing individuals, entities, locations, and objects that violate natural law (referred to as SCPs).  
  
This manga summarizes the reports of the SCPs currently under the Foundation.  
  
Based on the [SCP Foundation](http://www.scp-wiki.net/)

description.en:
He lost his new home and all his property, but found a cute girl!

Harold, a poor laborer who saved for years, finally obtained the house of his dreams, only to lose it to a fire the very same day. Feeling like nothing mattered anymore, Harold finds himself at an auction, where he ends up spending all of his savings on a slave, Atie...

Harold, with his secret technique, and Atie, with her skills as an adventurer, begin their freewheeling journey now!
___
[Webnovel link](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n0884fk/)
description.ja: 貯金に貯金を重ね念願のマイホームを手に入れたが、即日火事で失った貧乏労働者・ハロルド。すべてがどうでもよくなったハロルドは、偶然立ち寄った競売で貯金全てを使い、奴隷・アティを買ってしまうのだが…。秘密の技を持つハロルドと冒険者スキルを持つアティの気ままな旅が今、始まる！

altTitles.es: Tsumiki Omori y la extraña vida cotidiana.

altTitles.es-la: Tsumiki Omori y la extraña vida cotidiana.

altTitles.vi: Tsumiki Ogami Và Cuộc Sống DIệu Kỳ

description.en:
Today, we live in an age of diversity. The phrase "non-humans" is a thing of the past. "Genjin" live their lives interacting with human beings.

One human boy, Yutaka Shinsou, is troubled. He is so used to being in tune with his surroundings that he no longer understands his own feelings. At Keiki High School, where many "Genjin" attend, he meets Tsumiki Ogami, a werewolf. She is cute, powerful, a little out of the ordinary, and kind. When he spends time with her, Yutaka's heart is somehow noisier than usual. Spinning an "unusual" everyday life with Tsumiki the werewolf.
description.es: Hoy vivimos en la era de la diversidad. La expresión "no humanos" es cosa del pasado. Los "genjin" viven sus vidas interactuando con los seres humanos. Un chico humano, Yutaka Shinsou, tiene problemas. Está tan acostumbrado a estar en sintonía con su entorno que ya no comprende sus propios sentimientos. En el instituto Keiki, al que acuden muchos "genjin", conoce a Tsumiki Ogami, una mujer lobo. Es guapa, poderosa, un poco fuera de lo común y amable... Cuando pasa tiempo con ella, el corazón de Yutaka hace más ruido de lo normal. Hilando una "inusual" vida cotidiana con Tsumiki, la mujer lobo. El nuevo gráfico normal de la juventud está a punto de comenzar.
description.fr:
Aujourd'hui, nous vivons à l'ère de la diversité. L'expression « non-humains » appartient au passé. Les « Genjin » vivent leur vie en interaction avec les êtres humains.

Un garçon humain, Yutaka Shinsou, est troublé. Il est tellement habitué à être en phase avec son environnement qu'il ne comprend plus ses propres sentiments. Au lycée Keiki, que fréquentent de nombreux « Genjin », il rencontre Tsumiki Ogami, un loup-garou. Elle est mignonne, puissante, un peu hors du commun et gentille.

Lorsqu'il passe du temps avec elle, le cœur de Yutaka est plus bruyant que d'habitude. Une vie quotidienne « inhabituelle » avec Tsumiki le loup-garou.

Le nouveau parcours normal de la jeunesse est sur le point de commencer.
description.ja:
ウェアウルフの尾守つみきさんと紡ぐ、「普通」じゃない日常――

多様性の時代とされる現代。ついこの間まで「人ならざる存在」だった「幻人」は今は人間と関わり合って生活しています。舞台は、幻人が多く通う景希高校。そこにいたのは、ウェアウルフの尾守つみき（おがみつみき）さん。モフモフの耳と尻尾が揺れる、天真爛漫な美少女。真層友孝（しんそうゆたか）くんは、悩める人間の少年。人間関係が原因で、自分のことが分からなくなりました。友孝くんはつみきさんと出会い、自分の「気持ち」を見つけていきます。

「…人間って大変だぁ～」

日常が変わっていく、つみきさんと一緒なら。まだ誰も知らない、ニューノーマルな青春がここに。
description.pl:
Obecnie żyjemy w erze różnorodności. Wyrażenie „nie-ludzie” należy już do przeszłości. „Genjin” żyją w interakcji z ludźmi.

Pewien ludzki chłopiec, Yutaka Shinsou, jest zaniepokojony. Jest tak przyzwyczajony do bycia w zgodzie z otoczeniem, że nie rozumie już własnych uczuć. W Liceum Keiki, gdzie uczęszcza wielu „Genjin”, spotyka Tsumiki Ogami, wilkołaka. Jest urocza, potężna, trochę nietypowa i miła.

Kiedy spędza z nią czas, serce Yutaki staje się głośniejsze niż zwykle. Niezwykłe niecodzienne życie z wilkołakiem Tsumiki.
description.ru: Сегодня мы живём в эпоху культурного разнообразия. "Нелюди" постепенно ушли из словесного оборота. "Гендзины" живут своей жизнью, взаимодействуя с людьми. Один из человеческих мальчиков, Ютака Шинсо, кое-чем обеспокоен. Он настолько привык быть в гармонии со своим окружением, что перестал понимать свои собственные чувства. В средней школе Кэйки, где учатся многие "гендзины", он знакомится с оборотнем Цумики Огами. Она милая, сильная, немного странная и добрая... Когда Ютака проводит с ней время, его сердце почему-то бьется чаще обычного.
description.vi: Thời hiện đại trong câu chuyện này là thời đại của "đa dạng" giống loài, những chủng tộc bán nhân có một tên gọi mới là"Genjin" và sống cùng nền văn minh con người. Yukata Shinsou, 1 học sinh năm nhất cao trung bình thường quyết dịnh nhập học vào một ngôi trường tư thục có tỉ lệ Genjin cao nhất nước để tránh mặt những người bạn sơ trung của mình. Và rồi cậu gặp được Tsumiki Ogami, một cô nàng Genjin dạng người sói, và cô ấy sẽ dẫn cậu tận hưởng cuộc sống cao trung đầy màu sắc!
description.es-la: Hoy vivimos en la era de la diversidad. La expresión "no humanos" es cosa del pasado. Los "genjin" viven sus vidas interactuando con los seres humanos. Un chico humano, Yutaka Shinsou, tiene problemas. Está tan acostumbrado a estar en sintonía con su entorno que ya no comprende sus propios sentimientos. En el instituto Keiki, al que acuden muchos "genjin", conoce a Tsumiki Ogami, una mujer lobo. Es guapa, poderosa, un poco fuera de lo común y amable... Cuando pasa tiempo con ella, el corazón de Yutaka hace más ruido de lo normal. Hilando una "inusual" vida cotidiana con Tsumiki, la mujer lobo. El nuevo gráfico normal de la juventud está a punto de comenzar.
description.pt-br:
Hoje, vivemos numa era de diversidade. A frase “não-humanos” é coisa do passado. “Genjin” vivem suas vidas interagindo com seres humanos.

Um menino humano, Yutaka Shinsou, está preocupado. Ele está tão acostumado a estar em sintonia com o ambiente que não entende mais seus próprios sentimentos. No Colégio Keiki, onde muitos "Genjin" estudam, ele conhece Tsumiki Ogami, uma lobisomem. Ela é fofa, poderosa, um pouco fora do comum e gentil.

Quando ele passa um tempo com ela, o coração de Yutaka fica mais acelerado do que o normal. Girando uma vida cotidiana "incomum" com o lobisomem Tsumiki.

O novo gráfico normal da juventude está prestes a começar.

title.en: Shimotsuki-san wa Mobu ga Suki ~Hitomishiri na Kanojo wa Ore ni Dake Dere Amai~

altTitles.zh: 霜月同学喜欢上路人角色

altTitles.pl: Shimotsuki-san Lubi Postać Poboczną: Ta Nieśmiała Dziewczyna jest Urocza Tylko Wobec Mnie

altTitles.vi: Cô nàng Shimotsuki trót phải lòng nhân vật nền

description.en:
***Only you are special.***

After school, Koutarou Nakayama returns to school to pick up something he forgot and finds Shiho Shimotsuki asleep in an empty classroom. Shiho is rumored to be Ryouma Ryuuzaki's crush, a popular boy who has formed a harem in his class, but she is always expressionless and no one has ever seen her smile.

But now, her fair skin is holding Koutarou's hand...?! The "secret relationship" between the heroine and the mob begins!
description.id: Sepulang sekolah, Nakayama Koutarou kembali ke sekolah untuk mengambil sesuatu yang lupa dia bawa, di dalam kelas dia bertemu Shimotsuki Shiho yang terlelap. Katanya, Shiho ini ditaksir sama Ryuuzaki Ryouma, pria populer membentuk harem di kelas, namun dia tampak selalu datar dan tak ada yang pernah melihatnya tersenyum. Karena suatu kejadian mereka berdua berpegangan tangan dan memulai “hubungan rahasia” antara heroin dan mob.
description.ja:
『例えばもし、この世界が＜物語＞だとするならば主人公は一体誰になるのだろう――。』

高校入学式当日、義妹・親友・幼馴染の3人の少女に『サヨナラ』を告げられた中山幸太郎は、一人孤独な高校生活をスタートさせる。自分は誰の人生においても取るに足らない存在、『モブ』であることを明確に認識した幸太郎だったが、ある日の放課後、幸太郎は誰もいない教室で眠りこける霜月しほに遭遇する。クラスでハーレムを形成中のモテ男・竜崎龍馬の大本命だが、いつも無表情でクールと噂の彼女。その彼女が幸太郎の手を握り、満面の笑顔でこう言った。「わたしとお友達になってくれる？」

『この物語の主人公は俺ではない。そう思っていた。あの日までは――。』
description.pl:
Tylko ty jesteś wyjątkowy.

Po lekcjach Koutarou Nakayama wraca do szkoły, by zabrać coś, czego zapomniał i znajduje Shiho Shimotsuki śpiącą w pustej klasie. Mówi się, że Shiho podkochuje się w Ryoumie Ryuuzakim, popularnym chłopaku, który założył harem w swojej klasie, ale ona zawsze jest bez wyrazu i nikt nigdy nie widział jej uśmiechu.

Ale teraz, trzyma rękę Koutarou...?! Rozpoczyna się „sekretny związek” między bohaterką a postacią poboczną!
description.pt-br: Depois da escola, Kotaro Nakayama retorna à escola para pegar algo que esqueceu e encontra Shiho Shimotsuki dormindo em uma sala de aula vazia. Há rumores de que Shiho é a paixão de Ryoma Ryuuzaki, um garoto popular que formou um harém em sua classe, mas ela é sempre inexpressiva e ninguém nunca a viu sorrindo. Mas agora, ela está segurando a mão de Kotaro…?! A “relação secreta” entre a heroína e o figurante começa!

description.en:
"I’m... back!"

After a comet collides on Earth, a gaming world filled with monsters and dungeons becomes a reality. Amidst the chaos, Gong Won-Ho wakes up as Hardcore Leveling Warrior, an almighty game character with exceptional luck and power.

Once again, he will embark on a journey to become the strongest... but this time, on Earth!

In the world where the sea level has risen, the sea has already covered the continent.   
In the world where the land can not be found anymore, the family of the boy, 'Bota', lives in a small boat and wanders around.   
  
I am looking for another 'man' somewhere and I am safe in the rules that my father has set.
description.fr:
Le niveau de la mer s’est élevé pour recouvrir les continents. Sur une planète inhabitable où il n’y a plus de terre ferme, la famille du jeune Bota vit sur un petit bateau et erre dans le vaste océan. Mais d’étranges monstres habitent ces eaux hostiles… Pour survivre, il n’y a pas d’autre choix que de s’aventurer en eaux profondes, au risque de devenir la proie des léviathans.

Bota et sa famille parviendront-ils un jour à se mettre en sécurité et à échapper à cet enfer aquatique ?
description.vi: Trong một thế giới nơi mực nước biển đã dâng cao và đại dương đã bao phủ toàn bộ lục địa, đất liền không còn tồn tại nữa. Gia đình của cậu bé tên Bota sống trên một con thuyền nhỏ và lang thang khắp nơi. Tôi đang tìm kiếm một "người" nào đó ở đâu đó và an toàn trong những quy tắc mà cha tôi đã đặt ra.
description.pt-br: O mundo foi submerso e monstros marinhos governam a terra. Será que Bota e sua família irão conseguir escapar desse inferno marítimo? E quem diabos é Kana...?!

description.en:
The daily life of a (self-proclaimed) high school delinquent, fangirling and kohyuuing over the head prefect!?

(to) kohyuu (v. infinitive form) When one is surprised and excited, their breathing begins to kohyuu. (see: hyperventilation)

Summary: High school first-year Yuu is an ardent admirer of Head Prefect Atori, and in order to get her attention, Yuu begins to act like a delinquent. But while her intention is to appeal with her "badness" and "coolness," her simple-minded facade is seen through by Atori, who teases and treats her like a small animal...!?
description.ja: （自称）不良高校生、風紀委員長にコヒュらされる日々!?※「コヒュ-る」【動詞】…驚きやときめきによって息がコヒュッとなる。【あらすじ】風紀委員長・亜鳥に憧れ、気を引きたい一心でなぜか不良を目指すことにした高校一年生・優。しかしワルくてカッコいいところをアピールするはずが、天真爛漫で人たらしな亜鳥の言動に小動物のごとく翻弄される…!?

description.en: A brilliant hitman buys his freedom with the money he earned at work. Sakaki got a new name, as suggested by his former boss. He adopted a child to form a family, but ——…!?
The manga will focus on the character Koharu Hidaka, who is a middle school teacher close to 30 years old in 2007.
description.es-la: Año 2007, Hidaka Koharu ahora es maestra de secundaria y a punto de alcanzar los 30 años. Sin novio y sin perspectivas para el futuro. Balanceándose entre el trabajo y la búsqueda de matrimonio, el corazón de esta chica madura es como un Kikouken.

title.en: The Seven Deadly Sins: Four Knights of the Apocalypse

altTitles.tr: Yedi Ölümcül Günah: Mahşerin Dört Şövalyesi

description.en: Percival, a kind boy, lives with his grandfather in a remote place called "God's Finger". However, the world will not allow him to live in peace. An encounter with a mysterious knight changes their fate, and a shocking secret is revealed. The boy sets out on an endless journey. Whether you know "The Seven Deadly Sins" or not, you can still enjoy it! The world's most awaited adventure fantasy!
description.es:
La profecía se ha cumplido. "En un futuro no muy lejano, habrá cuatro caballeros sagrados que destruirán el mundo. Son los Cuatro Jinetes del Apocalipsis.""
Los santos caballeros que juraron fidelidad al rey Arturo estaban ansiosos por cortar el mal de raíz. Las consecuencias de estos acontecimientos llegan hasta la frontera... y sacuden el destino de un niño. Un niño que da el primer paso como le dice su corazón. ¿Qué le espera: sueños, esperanzas, gloria o pecado? La fantasía heroica del pasado y del presente, ¡el inicio!
description.fr: Percival vit seul avec son grand-père Bargis, au sommet d’une haute montagne nommée le “Doigt divin”. Il y mène une vie heureuse, préservé du monde extérieur. Mais le jour de ses 16 ans, son destin bascule : un mystérieux guerrier à l’armure rouge s’en prend violemment à lui et à son grand-père. En effet, ce Chevalier sacré de Camelot est chargé d’éliminer quiconque s’apparenterait aux “Four Knights of the Apocalypse”, un groupe de cavaliers qui, d’après la prophétie, apparaîtra pour renverser le roi Arthur… Laissé pour mort, Percival survit à ses blessures et décide de partir en quête de vengeance, et d’aventures !
description.ja:
『七つの大罪』正統続編！ 全世界待望の冒険ファンタジー!!

予言は示された。「遠くない未来、世界を滅ぼす四人の聖騎士が現れる。――その名を〈黙示録の四騎士〉」。厄災の芽を摘まんと色めき立つは、アーサー王に忠誠を誓いし一騎当千の聖騎士たち。その余波は、遠く辺境にまで及び……、一人の少年の運命を揺るがす！ 己が心の命ずるまま、一歩を踏み出す少年。その前途に待つは、夢か希望か栄光か罪か。古今無双のヒロイック・ファンタジー、開幕!!
description.pt: A profecia indicava que num futuro não muito distante, aparecerão quatro cavaleiros sagrados que destruirão o mundo: São os Quatro Cavaleiros do Apocalipse. Os quatro cavaleiros sagrados, que juraram fidelidade ao Rei Artur, estão muito animados para cortar esta calamidade pela raiz. As consequências chegam até à fronteira e abalam o destino de um rapaz, ......! Um rapaz dá um passo em frente como manda o seu coração. O que o espera é um sonho, uma esperança, glória ou pecado. Começa uma fantasia heróica dos mundos antigo e moderno!
description.tr: Nazik bir çocuk olan Percival, büyükbabasıyla birlikte "Tanrı'nın Parmağı" adlı uzak bir yerde yaşıyor. Ancak dünya onun barış içinde yaşamasına izin vermeyecektir. Gizemli bir şövalyeyle karşılaşmaları kaderlerini değiştirir ve şok edici bir sır ortaya çıkar. Çocuk sonsuz bir yolculuğa çıkar. "Yedi Ölümcül Günah"ı bilseniz de bilmeseniz de tadını çıkarabilirsiniz! Dünyanın en çok beklenen macera fantezisi!
description.uk: Історія є продовженням манги "Сім Смертних гріхів". Початок манги знайомить нас з Персівалем - шістнадцятирічний хлопець з ширяючого острова «Палець бога», який після певних подій вирушає в подорож чарівним королівством під назвою Британія.
description.es-la: Percival, un niño bondadoso, vive con su abuelo en un lugar remoto llamado "El dedo de Dios". Sin embargo, el mundo no le permite vivir en paz. Un encuentro con un misterioso caballero cambia su destino, y se revela un impactante secreto. El niño emprende un viaje interminable. Tanto si conoce "Los siete pecados capitales" como si no, ¡podrá disfrutar de él! ¡La fantasía de aventuras más esperada del mundo!
description.pt-br: Percival, um menino bem-humorado, vive com seu avô num lugar remoto chamado “O Dedo de Deus”. No entanto, o mundo não permite que ele viva em paz. Um encontro com um misterioso cavaleiro muda seu destino, e um segredo chocante é revelado. O menino embarca numa jornada sem fim.

title.en: Koi wa Ameagari no You ni

altTitles.es: Amor es cuando cesa la lluvia

altTitles.ja: 恋は雨上がりのように

altTitles.en: Love Is Like After The Rain

description.en:
Akira Tachibana is a soft-spoken high school student who used to be a part of the track and field club but, due to an injury, she is no longer able to run as fast as she once could. Working part-time at a family restaurant as a recourse, she finds herself inexplicably falling love with her manager, a divorced 45-year-old man with a young son.  
  
Despite the age gap, Akira wholeheartedly embraces his mannerisms and kind nature, which is seen as spinelessness by the other employees, and little by little, the two begin to understand each other. Although unable to explain why exactly she is attracted to him, Akira believes that a concrete reason is not needed to truly love someone. On a rainy day, she decides to finally tell her manager about how she feels… But just how will he react?
description.pt-br: Tachibana, uma linda garota do colegial está apaixonada... Não é um simples amor, algo que talvez seja impossível. Ela está apaixonada pelo gerente de seu trabalho que é mais velho que ela. Agora ela irá desistir de seu amor e viver sua simples vida cotidiana de colegial ou conseguirá passar os seus sentimento a alguém tão diferente dela.

altTitles.th: แด่เธอผู้เป็นนิรันดร์

description.en:
An immortal being was sent to the surface of the earth and met a boy living alone in the middle of tundra.   
The being can take the shape of dying things, but only if the "impetus" is stronger than the previous one. What sort of experiences and meetings will the being encounter while living forever?   

---   
- **Won the 43rd Kodansha Manga Award for Shonen in 2019** 
   
---

description.fr:
"C'est à l'épreuve de la réalité que je saurai ce que je suis... Voilà pourquoi mon voyage commence."

Un être sous forme d'une petite sphère est envoyé sur terre, celle-ci change d'apparence en fonction de ce qu'elle rencontre.
Elle rencontre d'abord un loup puis un jeune garçon vivant seul au milieu d'un paysage enneigé. Chaque nouvelle rencontre est une occasion de vivre de nouvelles expérience pour cet être. Ainsi commence le voyage de l'Immortel, un voyage fait d'expériences et de rencontres dans un monde implacable...
description.ja: 『聲の形』の大今良時が贈る、永遠の旅。真っ白な魂で世界に降り立つ！──現実だけが自分が誰なのかを教えてくれる。だから僕は、旅に出る。
description.ru: Отправленное на землю бессмертное существо знакомится с мальчиком, одиноко живущим в Тундре. Существо может принимать форму умерших, но только если «импульс» сильнее предыдущего. С какими впечатлениями и встречами столкнётся существо, живущее вечно?
description.pt-br:
Um ser imortal foi enviado à superfície da terra e encontrou um menino que vivia sozinho no meio da tundra.
O ser pode assumir a forma de coisas moribundas, mas somente se o "ímpeto" for mais forte que o anterior. Que tipo de experiências e encontros o ser encontrará enquanto viver para sempre?

---
- **Ganhou o 43º Prêmio Kodansha Manga na categoria shounen em 2019**

altTitles.ja: うさみさんは構われたい！

altTitles.zh: 羽冴美同学想要被照顾

description.en: Usami Nagisa is a yankee who suffers from a supposed "rare disease" which causes her health to decline if she feels lonely. Sewa Natsuhito, the boy who sits next to her in class realizes this and keeps her company, but the only way Usami believes she can cure her "illness" is to make lots of friends, a process she might find quite difficult due to her aggressive looks and personality.
description.it: Usami Nagisa è una yankee che soffre di una presunta "malattia rara" che causa il declino della sua salute se si sente sola. Sewa Natsuhito, il ragazzo che le siede accanto in classe, se ne rende conto e le tiene compagnia, ma l'unico modo in cui Usami crede di poter curare la sua "malattia" è farsi molti amici, un processo che potrebbe risultare piuttosto difficile per il suo aspetto aggressivo e la sua personalità.
description.pt-br: Usami Nagisa é uma delinquente que sofre de uma suposta doença rara que faz com que sua saúde diminua se ela se sentir sozinha. Sewa Natsuhito, o menino que senta ao lado dela na aula percebe isso e lhe faz companhia, mas a única maneira de Usami acreditar que ela pode curar sua "doença" é fazendo muitos amigos, um processo que ela pode achar muito difícil devido à sua agressividade aparência e personalidade.

description.en: Mysterious alien life-forms invade Earth! Most of humanity is wiped off the face of the planet. John, his sister, and the remaining survivors hope to find a new world to inhabit… But one day, they’re targeted by aliens again! (MANGA Plus)

Twelve years ago, the powerful Nine-Tailed Demon Fox attacked the ninja village of Konohagakure. The demon was quickly defeated and sealed into the infant Naruto Uzumaki, by the Fourth Hokage who sacrificed his life to protect the village. Now Naruto is the number one knucklehead ninja who's determined to become the next Hokage and gain recognition by everyone who ever doubted him!
description.pt-br: Versão totalmente colorida do famoso mangá "Naruto". Uzumaki Naruto é um garoto que teve um demônio preso dentro dele quando era um bebê, para evitar que esse demônio destruísse sua vila. Ele cresceu sendo temido por todos, já que existe a lembrança dos mortos pelo demônio em quase todas as famílias. Evitado e ignorado, tudo o que ele realmente deseja é ser amado e reconhecido pelos outros, pelo que de fato ele é. Acompanhe a vida de Naruto, seu amor pela "doce e amável" Sakura e sua "amizade" com Sasuke... Uma história aparentemente simples, em que o herói acumula poderes e vence os malvados, fazendo amigos no caminho, certo? Errado. Naruto tem ação e comédia, sim, mas o tema central do mangá é a solidão e como cada um dos personagens lida com essa solidão. A leveza cômica de alguns capítulos é francamente contrastante com o clima pesado e trágico de outros.

title.en: Tying the Knot with an Amagami Sister

altTitles.fr: Se Marier avec une Sœur Amagami
Comment j'ai Marié une Sœur Amagami

altTitles.es-la: El Emparejamiento de la Familia Amagami

description.en: Kamihate Uryuu, orphaned since childhood, receives an invitation to stay at the local Shinto shrine. All he wanted was a quiet place to study so that he can fulfill his dream of making it into a top medical school, but after arriving there, he comes across three beautiful shrine maiden sisters... and the head priest requests that he marry one of them and take over the shrine.
description.fr: Kamihate Uryuu, orphelin depuis l'enfance, reçoit une invitation à séjourner dans le sanctuaire shinto local. Tout ce qu'il voulait, c'était un endroit tranquille pour étudier afin de réaliser son rêve d'entrer dans une grande école de médecine, mais en arrivant sur place, il tombe sur trois belles demoiselles du sanctuaire... Le prêtre en chef lui demande d'épouser l'une d'entre elles et de prendre la succession du sanctuaire. Une histoire d'amour et de miracles est sur le point de se dérouler !
description.ja: 京大医学部を目指す高校生の上終 瓜生。児童養護施設育ちの瓜生は「甘神神社」の宮司さんに引き取られ、居候することに。受験勉強ができる環境があれば…と思っていたが、居候の条件は「婿養子として神社を継ぐ」こと!? しかも結婚相手は同居する巫女三姉妹!! 一つ屋根の下、巫女と紡ぐ恋と奇跡の物語、開幕!!
description.ru: Камихатэ Урю долгое время прожил в приюте, пока не был взят под опеку священником Тидори Амагами. Остановившись в храме, Урю узнаёт, что здесь живут три жрицы-сёстры, которые являются внучками главного священника. В конечном итоге, Тидори Амагами рассказывает, что взял парня под опеку, чтобы он женился на одной из его внучек и унаследовал храм, как его зять. Так начинается история любви и чудес с семьёй Амагами.
description.vi:
Được thực hiện bởi phụ tá của Negi Haruba và được chính tác giả của Gotou-bun khuyến khích xem thử. Từ Oneshot nay đã có series và được đông đảo mọi người đón nhận
Uryuu Kamihate chuyển đến Kyoto và tình cờ sống chung với 3 chị em Miko trong một ngôi đền. Tuy vậy cậu lại là một người không tin vào thần linh mà chỉ tin tưởng bản thân mình, chuyện gì sẽ xảy đến với Uryuu khi xung quanh cậu là 3 chị em vu nữ xinh đẹp đây?
description.es-la: Un chico que había perdido la fe en las Oraciones y los Dioses, de pronto conocerá a 3 hermosas Hermanas que son Doncellas del Templo donde comenzará a vivir, ¿Esto afectará de alguna Manera a nuestro Protagonista? Léelo para descubrirlo.
description.pt-br: Kamihate Uryuu, órfão desde a infância, recebe um convite para ficar no santuário xintoísta local. Tudo o que ele queria era um lugar tranquilo para estudar, para que pudesse realizar seu sonho de entrar para uma faculdade de medicina de ponta, mas depois de chegar lá, ele se depara com três belas irmãs donzelas do santuário... E o sacerdote chefe pede que ele se case com uma delas e assuma o santuário. Uma história de amor e milagres está prestes a se desenrolar!

altTitles.ja: あさぎ色のサウダージ

description.en:
Ren Fujisawa could not find a place in her hometown or in Tokyo where the pieces of her identity fit together. She was about to give up on everything, when the person who appeared in front of her was the person she missed the most in the world, the person she wanted to see more than anything else in the world, the person she wanted to see so badly that she would die.

A promising, delicately and emotionally depicts a human story that will sink deep into your heart, especially in this time when everyone is lonely.

You can’t win through only with “friendship” and “youth”. We stake our lives to get to Koshien!!  
  
Kanou Shoutarou entered an official baseball club at one of the best powerhouse baseball schools in the country - DL Gakuen. However the discipline in the club, he admired so much, was beyond all imagination!  
  
From Nakibokuro - the former member of PL Gakuen’s baseball club who played at the Koshien as the regular!

Ura baito, also known as a shady part-time job: a gray area job that pays very well. The price you pay is your life.  
Yume Kokuryo and Nagomi Shirahama are seeking a large sum of money for some reason. 
To that end, they casually dive into various shady part-time jobs. 

This work may affect you physically and mentally. Read it at your own risk. 
We are not responsible for any damage to your health.

She was destroying people... in her mind.

Kiho Ishiguro is a high school girl who's an honor student at school, and devotes herself to her disabled mother at home. She is quiet and gentle, but deep down inside she has always had the urge to "hit someone". As her feelings gets stronger day by day, Kiho encounters a street criminal. She snaps and unleashes her rage on the bad guy without restraint...? Here comes the JK who will revolutionize the world of women's MMA!
description.es: Kuroishi Kiho, en la escuela es una estudiante ejemplar, en casa es una buena hija que ayuda a su madre con sus problemas en las piernas... pero en sus fantasías, es alguien que hace pedazos a la gente. Aunque parece tranquila y gentil, en lo más profundo de su corazón existe un impulso que la hace querer "golpear a otros". Desbordada por las fantasías que no la dejan en paz, decide confrontar a un violador, ¿Será capaz de liberar y apaciguar sus emociones reprimidas con este criminal? ¡Entra en escena la estudiante de preparatoria que podría revolucionar las artes marciales de mujeres!
description.ja:
空想の世界で人を壊していた――。

学校では優等生、家では足が悪い母親に尽くす女子高生・黒石希歩。物静かで優しい印象を持たれる彼女は、「人を殴りたい」という衝動をずっと抱えて生きていた。内なる狂気が膨れ上がる中、希歩は巷で話題となっていた通り魔と遭遇する……。

description.en:
Jiwoo is a kind-hearted young man who harnesses the lightning quick reflexes of a cat to secretly make the world a better place – one saved little child or foster pet at a time. Kayden is a secret agent on the run, who finds himself stuck in the body of a …um… decidedly fat old fluffy cat. Together, armed with Jiwoo’s super powers and Kayden’s uber-smarts, they’re out to fight those forces who would let evil rule this world. That is, if they can stand each other long enough to get the job done.

description.es:
Jiwoo es un joven amable que utiliza sus reflejos increíblemente rápidos, como los de un gato, para hacer del mundo un mejor lugar salvando niños o mascotas. Kayden es un agente secreto prófugo que termina encerrado en el cuerpo de un... mmm... gato gordo, peludo y viejo. Juntos y con la ayuda de los superpoderes de Jiwoo y la inteligencia de Kayden lucharán contra las fuerzas que desean que el mal tome control del mundo. Aunque solo lo lograrán si consiguen soportarse lo suficiente para hacerlo.

Jiwoo est un jeune lycéen au bon coeur qui utilise ses réflexes incroyablement rapides pour rendre le monde meilleur, que ce soit en sauvant un petit enfant ou bien un animal de compagnie. Kayden est un agent secret fugitif qui finit par être enfermé dans le corps d'un... euh... vieux, gros chat tout poilu. Ensemble, et équipés des superpouvoirs de Jiwoo et de l'intelligence de Kayden, ils lutteront contre les forces obscures qui veulent que le mal domine le monde... mais seulement s'ils arrivent à bien s'entendre !

description.ru:
Кайден - загадочный человек, который словно комета спустился с неба. Весь израненный, почти потерявший последние силы, он решает скрыть свое присутствие - ведь по-другому от погони не уйти. По дороге Кайден встречает обычную дворовую кошку и, почти не думая, решает вселиться в ее тело. Со Чжи У - энергичный и общительный молодой человек из средней школы, который очень любит кошек. Один раз по пути домой он встречает до боли потрепанного кота и берет его к себе домой. Наш У не только добрый, но еще и обладает одной скрытой способностью. Какой же?

description.pt-br:
Ji-U é um jovem de bom coração que aproveita os reflexos rápidos de um gato para secretamente tornar o mundo um lugar melhor - uma criança salva ou um animal de estimação adotivo de cada vez. Kayden é um agente secreto em fuga, que se encontra preso no corpo de um... hum... decididamente gordo velho gato fofo. Juntos, armados com os superpoderes de Ji-U e a super inteligência de Kayden, eles estão prontos para lutar contra as forças que deixariam o mal governar este mundo. Isto é, se eles aguentarem um ao outro tempo suficiente para fazer o trabalho.

description.en: "Uhm-uhm… N-Nice to meet you! I'm Nyoroko". A girl – not good at talking to people – is invited by her friend Matsuri and and challenged into doing a live broadcast for her first time. A youthful 4-koma comedy!

altTitles.en: Not Enough to Take a Photo

description.en: Two university students struggling with money get inspired after watching a couple earn big money through adult content streaming. Despite not being in a relationship, they end up caught in the flow of making videos.
description.ja: 先輩・丹河♀×後輩・須藤♂の２人は金欠生活に終止符を打つべくアダルト配信で一儲けしようと企むが…!?

title.en: The Reincarnated Assassin Is a Swordmaster

altTitles.es-la: El asesino reencarnado es un genio de la espada

altTitles.en: The Reincarnated Assassin is a Genius Swordsman

description.en:
Raon was once a loyal assassin for House Robert until Derus killed him. Not willing to give up, Raon prayed for vengeance and woke as a member of House Sieghart, the most powerful noble house!

He’ll need all of their near-infinite resources to get revenge. Though he carried over knowledge of a powerful Flame Link technique, he also carries the Curse of Bitter Frost, something that’s slowly killing him.

As if that weren’t enough, the demonic embodiment of Wrath is trying to take over his body!?
description.zh:
拉昂的一生就像一条拴着锁链的狗。
然而，造化弄人，他获得了新生
--即使他的怒火依然留在断裂的锁链之中。
终于能够自立，他决定按照自己的意愿生活。
“我会杀死一切阻挡我的人，神也不例外。”

altTitles.pt-br: Até Que Eu (Ele) Me Torne Ela

altTitles.ja-ro: Ore ga Watashi ni Naru made

description.en:
A boy who used to be abusive to girls wakes up one day as one.

"I'll go back being a boy soon," he thought, however that was not the case. 
Follow Akira as he grows and learns little by little to accept the puzzling changings in her surroundings and her heart.
description.es: Un niño que solía molestar a otras niñas un día se despierta como una. "Volveré pronto a ser un chico" el pensó, este no fue el caso. Sigue a Akira mientras crece y aprende poco a poco a aceptar los confusos cambios en sus alrededores y en su corazón.
description.fr: Un garçon qui avait l'habitude de malmener les filles se réveille un jour comme si il en était une. "Je redeviendrai bientôt un garçon", se dit-il, mais ce n'est pas le cas. Suivez Akira au fur et à mesure qu'il grandit et apprend peu à peu à accepter les changements déroutants de son environnement et de son cœur.
description.es-la: Kira es un chico que solía ser abusivo con las chicas, hasta que un día se despierta como una. "Volveré a ser un chico pronto", es lo que pensó, sin embargo, ese no seria el caso. Sigue a Akira mientras crece y aprende poco a poco a aceptar los cambios desconcertantes en su entorno y en su corazón
description.pt-br: Um menino que costumava ser abusivo com as meninas acorda um dia como uma garota. “Em breve voltarei a ser menino” ele pensou, mas não foi o caso. Siga Akira enquanto ele cresce e aprende pouco a pouco a aceitar as mudanças intrigantes ao seu redor e em seu coração.

description.fr: Tomber amoureux devrait être une expérience excitante... mais pas pour Hari ! Notre héroïne est maudite par l'amour non réciproque, et Yura compte bien en profiter. Hari réussira-t-elle à avouer ses sentiments à son premier amour, ou se laissera-t-elle emporter par les complications de cet amour non partagé ? Son histoire d'amour passionnante est sur le point de commencer.
description.ko:
사랑에 빠지면 짜릿하다는데… 그래도 이건 아니잖아! 
짝사랑으로 인해 저주에 걸려버린 하리와 그 저주를 빌려달라는 유라.
하리는 과연 짝남 정원에게 고백할 것인가? 아니면 짝사랑을 포기할 것인가?
짜릿짜릿 하리의 첫사랑 전기 시작!

altTitles.ja: 帝乃三姉妹は案外、チョロい。

altTitles.en: The Mikadono Sisters are Surprisingly Easy to Deal With.

altTitles.zh: 帝乃三姐妹原来很好搞定

altTitles.zh-hk: 帝乃三姊妹意外的好對付。

altTitles.id: Kakak beradik Mikadono ternyata sangat mudah ditangani.

altTitles.vi: Ba Chị Em Nhà Mikadono Dễ Đối Phó Thật Đấy

description.en: Though Ayase Yuu is the son of a renowned and talented actress, he is below average in anything he does. He is entrusted to live under the care of his mother's friend, and later discovers that he will also be rooming with the three sisters from his school who possess both beauty and talent. Though Yuu thought that an understanding would be impossible to reach between an ordinary person and those blessed with talent, the three sisters are surprisingly...?!
description.id: Meskipun Ayase Yuu adalah putra seorang aktris terkenal dan berbakat, dia berada di bawah rata-rata dalam segala hal yang dia lakukan. Dia dipercaya untuk hidup di bawah asuhan teman ibunya, dan kemudian mengetahui bahwa dia juga akan sekamar dengan tiga saudara perempuan dari sekolahnya yang memiliki kecantikan dan bakat. Meskipun Yuu berpikir bahwa pemahaman tidak mungkin dicapai antara orang biasa dan mereka yang diberkati dengan bakat, ketiga saudara perempuan itu secara mengejutkan...?!
description.ja:
孤高の天才三姉妹と同居することになったちょっとポンコツめな高校生・優。平凡以下な彼が三姉妹に振り回されると思いきや…この三姉妹、案外、チョロい――？

優との生活で変わっていく三姉妹の心模様。才色兼備の三姉妹が動揺、狼狽、そしてときめく…
description.pt-br: Embora Ayase Yuu seja filho de uma atriz renomada e talentosa, ele está abaixo da média em tudo o que faz. Ele é encarregado de viver sob os cuidados de um amigo de sua mãe, e mais tarde descobre que também vai morar com as três irmãs de sua escola que possuem beleza e talento. Embora Yuu pensasse que um entendimento seria impossível de alcançar entre uma pessoa comum e aqueles abençoados com talento, as três irmãs são surpreendentemente...?!

description.en: “Chimeras” are people that have been infused with animal DNA in order to give them superpowers and abilities, however society doesn’t favor them so they live in fear and rejection. Our main character, code name “01”, works as a mercenary who happens upon an old acquaintance. He’s then given a job to protect and transport Enoch, a girl who is sought out to be the perfect “material”, to the borders of Canada.
description.fr: Les "chimères" sont des personnes auxquelles on a infusé de l'ADN animal afin de leur donner des superpouvoirs et des capacités, mais la société ne les favorise pas, si bien qu'elles vivent dans la peur et le rejet. Notre personnage principal, dont le nom de code est "01", travaille comme un mercenaire qui tombe sur une vieille connaissance. Il est ensuite chargé de protéger et de transporter Enoch, une fille qui est recherchée pour être le "matériel" parfait, jusqu'aux frontières du Canada.
description.pt: “Quimeras” são pessoas que foram infundidas com DNA animal para receber superpoderes e habilidades, mas a sociedade os despreza e vivem marginalizados. Nosso protagonista, codinome “01”, trabalha como um mercenário e recebe a missão de proteger e levar Enoch, o “material” perfeito, à fronteira do Canadá.

altTitles.zh: 想不通可爱老婆为什么要与我结婚

altTitles.zh-ro: Xiǎng bùtōng kě'ài lǎopó wèishéme yào yǔ wǒ jiéhūn

description.en: My wife is suspicious!! Why did she marry a guy like me…? Ordinary average guy Tsuchioka Naotsugu ended up with Yoshino, who's perfect in all angles of beauty, know-how, and sociability. It's not "marriage blue" it's everyday life questioning over things, so it's "marriage gray" newlywed life, go!
description.ja: ウチのかわいすぎる妻は、なぜ超平凡な自分と結婚したのか――!? 自己評価激低な夫・槌岡直継は、妻・憙乃への疑念から“マリッジグレー”に陥っていた！一方の憙乃は、日々溢れまくる直継へのLOVEを抑えるのに一生懸命で…!?
description.pt-br: Minha esposa é muito suspeita! Eu não entendo por que ela se casou com alguém como eu? Por que uma mulher bonita, inteligente, e considerada como a Yoshino se casaria com alguém comum como Naotsugu!! Não há casamento azul aqui, apenas um suspeito caso de casamento cinza!!

altTitles.ja: WxY ダブリューエックスワイ

description.en: For the entirety of his life, Yokoda Takashi has been drawing erotic drawings and it has been his way of expressing his sexuality. And now, he has managed to become a successful erotic comedy manga author for a monthly magazine. His series stars a character named Aimi who is actually based loosely on his niece with the same name. He keeps his job a secret, especially from his family from the fear that using Aimi's name in such a perverted way would cause hatred from everyone. But his manga's popularity rises and gets moved to a weekly magazine where there are vastly more readers and it seems like only a matter of time until the truth comes out. Takashi has to struggle between protecting his secret while keeping up with the production and erotic creativeness that comes with a weekly magazine series.

title.en: Mamahaha no Tsurego ga Moto Kanodatta

altTitles.ja: 継母の連れ子が元カノだった

altTitles.en: My Stepmom's Daughter Is My Ex
My Stepmom's Daughter was My EX-Girlfriend

altTitles.pt-br: A Filha da minha Madrasta era minha ex-Namorada.

altTitles.ru: Дочь моей мачехи - моя бывшая девушка

altTitles.es-la: La hija de mi madrastra es mi ex-novia.

description.en:
A certain boy and girl in middle school became lovers, flirted with each other, disagreed on trivial things, became more frequently irritated with each other rather than excited... and ended up breaking up on graduation. And so, the two of them, Irido Mizuto and Ayai Yume, wound up meeting each other in the most unexpected fashion.

"Isn't it obvious that I'm the elder brother." "Isn't it obvious that I'm the elder sister."

The children of the partner of their parent's remarriage was their ex-lover!? The former couple, mindful of their parent's feelings, decided on a 'sibling rule' where the one takes conscious of the other as the opposite sex loses, but— When they encounter each other in the bathroom, commute to and from school together... along with the memories of the past and living under the same roof, just how do they disregard each other!?
___
- [Official Twitter](https://twitter.com/tsurekano)
- [Light Novel](https://j-novel.club/series/my-stepmom-s-daughter-is-my-ex) - English translation at J-Novel Club.
description.ja: まだお互いに、好き同士。そんな元カップルが――親の再婚できょうだいに!?　第3回カクヨムWeb小説コンテスト大賞受賞の人気ノベルをコミカライズ！ 一つ屋根の下で繰り広げられる、ひたすらに甘くて焦れったい悶絶ラブコメ！
description.ru:
Эта история о парне и девушке, которые влюбились друг в друга ещё в средней школе. Тем не менее, со временем их любовь превратилась во взаимное раздражение, что привело к их расставанию после окончания школы…  
Но кто бы мог подумать, что судьбы Иридо Мизуто и Айя Юмэ пересекутся вновь при самых неожиданных для них обстоятельствах… Теперь они вынуждены жить под одной крышей, изображая для своих родителей сводного брата и сестру.   
Но оставаясь наедине и предаваясь воспоминаниям о прошлом… Смогут ли они сдержаться и не поддаться своему соблазну?!

description.en: Mob Psycho 100 is the story about a young middle schooler, Shigeo Kageyama, nicknamed "Mob" living in Seasoning City. Ever since he was young, he has had astounding psychic powers. However, this esper power is unable to grant him the one thing he wishes for the most: to be friends with the girl he likes in his class.
description.ja:
何かが「100」になったとき、爆発する少年モブ。
外見はいたって普通ーというよりむしろ地味。場の空気を読むのが苦手な彼は、実は強力な超能力の持ち主だった。
そんな彼の能力に目をつけ、次々と現れるニセ霊能力者に宗教団体、不良番長、謎の秘密組織・・・。
フツーの青春を願うモブに、平穏な日は訪れるのか？
description.ru: Кагэяма Сигэо, также известный как «Моб», восьмиклассник с психическими способностями. Он мог сгибать ложки и поднимать вещи силой мысли с ранних лет, но затем стал постепенно сдерживаться от использования способностей на публике. Теперь, единственное, чего он хочет — подружиться с девочкой из класса, Цубоми. Вместе со своим психическим «наставником», он продолжает повседневную жизнь, пытаясь понять свое назначение в жизни.
description.pt-br: Kageyama Shigeo (ou "Mob") é um estudante do 8º ano com habilidades psíquicas. Desde pequeno, ele é capaz de entortar colheres e fazer objetos levitarem usando sua mente, mas, aos poucos, passou a evitar usar suas habilidades em público devido à atenção negativa que recebia. Agora, a única coisa que ele quer é se tornar amigo de uma garota de sua classe, Tsubomi. Junto com seu "mentor psíquico" (que não tem poderes psíquicos), ele continua sua vida cotidiana, tentando realizar seu objetivo de vida.

altTitles.ja: ストライクウィッチーズ　紅の魔女たち

description.en:
The year is 1944, around when Miyafuji Yoshika joined the 501st JFW to protect Gallia.  
  
The South European nation Romagna is launching a Neuroi counteroffensive with its 504th JFW, nicknamed The Ardor Witches. Its core is made up by the Duchy of Romagna's elite, the Red Pants Unit, but, what is soon becoming evident as the detachment is coming together, is that the members all seem to a bit peculiar, not the least of which the commander.  
  
What will destiny have in store for this group   
of girls…?

altTitles.vi: Bị Che Khuất Bởi Ánh Mặt Trời Lặn
Tà dương trong đôi mắt vô hồn

altTitles.ru: Закат, отражённый в её ледяном взгляде

description.en:
The witch Hildegar, who received the blessing of the Sun Goddess Karia, is known far and wide for her fearsome reputation.  
The Northerner Elkin, who lost his homeland, chases after the witch towards a nameless castle…
description.ko:
태양의 신 카리야의 가호를 받은 마녀 '힐데가르'.
고향을 잃은 북부인 '에르킨'은 마녀를 쫓아 이름 없는 성으로 향한다.
description.pt-br:
A bruxa Hildegar, que recebeu a bênção da Deusa do Sol Karia, é conhecida em toda parte por sua temível reputação.  
O nortista Elkin, que perdeu sua terra natal, persegue a bruxa em direção a um castelo sem nome...

description.en: Jake, a seemingly average office worker, unexpectedly finds himself thrust into a fantasy world teeming with dangers and opportunities. Rather than succumbing to fear, Jake thrives in this unfamiliar realm. As he navigates the expansive multiverse, his power grows and he transforms—evolving from a mundane office worker into a true apex hunter.

altTitles.th: AOASHI แข้งเด็กหัวใจนักสู้

description.de: Aoi Ashito ist ein Mittelschüler im dritten Jahr aus Ehime. Hinter seinem rohen Spiel verbirgt sich sein immenses Talent, aber Ashito erleidet wegen seiner allzu geradlinigen Persönlichkeit einen großen Rückschlag. Der Manager der Jugendmannschaft des J1-Clubs Tokyo City Esperion, Fukuda Tetsuya, erscheint vor Ashito. Fukuda sieht Ashitos grenzenloses Potenzial und lädt ihn ein, an den Probespielen seines Teams in Tokio teilzunehmen. Die Geschichte des Jungen, der den Fußball in Japan revolutionieren wird, beginnt sich schnell zu entfalten.
description.en:
Aoi Ashito is a third year middle school student from Ehime. Behind his raw game hides his immense talent 
but Ashito suffers a huge setback because of his overly straightforward personality. 
One day the youth team manager of J1 club Tokyo City Esperion, Fukuda Tetsuya, appears in front of him. 
Fukuda sees his limitless potential and invites him to take part in his team's tryouts in Tokyo. 
The story of the boy who will revolutionize football in Japan rapidly begins to unfold.  
  
---
- **Won the 65th Shogakukan Manga Award for General Manga in 2019**
description.ru: Ашито Аой, ученик третьего класса средней школы из префектуры Эхиме, встречает тренера «Молодежной лиги J» Фукуду Тацую. Несмотря на свою грубость, Ашито обладает таким удивительным потенциалом, что тренер Фукуда приглашает его принять участие в отборочных тестах своей команды в Токио. Взгляните на историю мальчика, который совершит революцию в японском футболе.
description.tr: Aoi Ashito Ehime'de ortaokul 3. sınıfa giden bir öğrencidir. Bir gün karşısına J1 Ligi kulübü Tokyo City Esperion'un altyapı takımı menajeri Fukuda Tetsuya çıkar. Fukuda Aoi'nin sonsuz potansiyelini farkeder ve onu Tokyo'daki altyapı seçmelerine davet eder. Böylece Japon futbolunda devrim yapacak çocuğun hikayesi başlar.
description.pt-br: Ashito Aoi, um estudante do terceiro ano do ensino médio de Ehime, conhece Fukuda Tatsuya, um treinador da "J Youth League". Mesmo que ainda tenha uma personalidade forte, Ashito tem um incrível potêncial que o fez ser convidado pelo treinador Fukuda para participar da seleção de sua equipe em Tóquio. A história do garoto que vai revolucionar o futebol no Japão vai começar.
